title: Remote Memory Exposure
overview: When a number is passed to `api_key`, affected versions of openwhisk allocate an uninitialized buffer and send that over network in Authorization header (base64-encoded).    PoC:    ```js    var openwhisk = require(openwhisk);    var options = {apihost: 127.0.0.1:1433, api_key: 50};    var ow = openwhisk(options);    ow.actions.invoke({actionName: sample}).then(result => console.log(result))    ```        Reported at 2017-03-01
